name: Project Pitch Black
description:
Project Pitch Black is a survival horror / maze game. The game has a 2D top-down view and simulates the terrifying experience of John Doe who is trapped in a city invaded by evil entities and upon learning of an opportunity to escape must infiltrate the tallest building in town, overcome the dangers and obstacles to reach the roof and be rescued.

  • Movement: Move to evade danger. Use WASD to move around levels.
  • Cone of vision: Point your flashlight to see what’s in front of you … or behind you. Use your mouse to direct the flashlight.
  • Item Collecting: Find key to advance floors
  • Hide on Furniture: Hide and evade danger at all costs. Press E to Hide
  • Minigames: Battle for your survival on Thrilling minigames
  • Vendor: Exchange fingers to survive a little longer
